ovdesc.p: The MG.SCHEDULES application records any future events on contracts by individual event date. The types of event that are recorded on this file are:
- Repayments of principal and interest. - Repayments of additional payment types. - Penalty interest processing. - Principal movements. - Levying of charges.

For each of these event types listed only the next occurence of this event is recorded on this file. For example a contract may require 300 repayments over the duration of its life. However, at any given time there will only be one repayment schedule for the next repayment date.
Each record on this file is for a specific contract and a specific date. Therefore a single contract is likely to produce a number of records on this file.
This file is maintained automatically by the system. There is no facility to manually update this file.

This field does not indicate the specific additional types which are to be repaid but merely the requirement for a repayment.
